_description: Configuration for ddG (ΔΔG) calculations using PyRosetta for stability analysis

_parameter_descriptions.mutations: List of mutations in format ['A10G', 'B15L'] (empty list for CLI input)
_parameter_descriptions.trajectories: Number of trajectories per mutation (currently fixed at 1)
_parameter_descriptions.repack_radius: Radius around mutation for sidechain repacking (Angstroms)
_parameter_descriptions.minimize: Whether to minimize the structure after mutation
_parameter_descriptions.use_cartesian: Whether to use Cartesian minimization (vs torsional)
_parameter_descriptions.temperature: Monte Carlo temperature for acceptance criterion

single_mutation.description: Calculate ddG for a single mutation

large_repack.description: Use larger repacking radius for buried mutations

cartesian_minimize.description: Use Cartesian minimization for better accuracy
